website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy, high-quality lamp with a unique natural stone design.
pros: Owners appreciate this lamp for its brightness, class, and character
Natural beauty in a streamlined design
cons: The lamp has a shiny finish which doesn't appeal to everyone
The exact colors of the stones aren't guaranteed

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty!
customer_reviews.text: The reviews were mixed and I went with it anyway and I am glad I did. You have to screw off a part of the lamp and put the shade on, screw the piece back on and then put in the light bulb. The rocks are shiney but I like them. We have a pond and they look like wet rocks to me. I bought a low wattage bulb and plan to leave it on all night so my kids will stop leaving on the kitchen light. It is really pretty and fits great where I put it. Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: a nice accent piece for a corner space in your home
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a delightful accent piece look no further. The lamp offers a dark wood base with earthen-tone stones (yes they are shiny but not overly so). The lamp shade offers a cloth textured material that glows warmly when lit. Overall, a nice accent piece for a corner space in your home. LOVE this lamp! I've attached a picture so you can get a better idea.
customer_reviews.author: Anna's Things

customer_reviews.title: Love this lamp!!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love this lamp. It looks perfect atop my five foot fountain, same coloring, same smaller rocks on the bottom I love this lamp!!!!))!
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Great Accent Lamp! I love this!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS LAMP! After reading the reviews and the questions, I was apprehensive about buying it. Size wise, it's a great accent lamp. It's not high enough for example, if you're buying a pair of end table lamps for the living room or bedroom. However, it's just a great smaller accent lamp. The colors of my rocks are gray, tan, and green. The rocks are a little too shiny but I don't care. This is a PERFECT accent light that enables you to bring a touch of the outside in to your house. Very original and unique. Worth every penny! Don't hesitate if you're kicking around purchasing this!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Sells

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice...
customer_reviews.text: I got this through the Amazon Warehouse at a great price and I like it a lot. No problems with functionality, I like the color of the stones, and unlike some reviewers, I easily figured out the proper way to put the shade on it. The shade goes on first, the nut holds it in place, then the bulb goes in. The neck of the lamp is jointed to allow easy leveling and adjustment of the shade. I used a dusk to dawn LED bulb so it comes on when it gets dark, turns off automatically in the morning, and uses only 6 watts. Perfect for a hallway night light ...
customer_reviews.author: Highlander

customer_reviews.title: Mmmm....lamps.......
customer_reviews.text: I love these lamps. Although not very tall, they disperse light beautifully so as not to be too garish and distracting. Like most other items on Amazon, I was concerned if what I was seeing would be what I was getting, and wasn't disappointed. I had no problems with the rocks being damaged or just off. They came well packaged, set up was quick and uneventful. I would most definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp, but you can only buy ONE
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is amazing (really 5 stars worthy). So unique and even with a black shade, puts out great light. I'm giving it only 4 stars because I was only able to buy ONE. I wanted two. I had to buy the second one from Home Depot (go there if you find yourself in the same situation). When I tried to buy two, I was blocked saying that the vendor limited them to one per person. I have never heard anything like that on Amazon. So, I have one set up and waiting for the Home Depot lamp to arrive tomorrow. Bad business, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: H. Williams

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars but the stones are ugly!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp (overall) is WAY TOO CUTE! I wanted to give a 4 star rating because of the stones but could not because I just love this lamp. The stones are FUGLY! I did not get the multi color as shown in the picture. I got 6 puke green colored stones and two of them reddish. I wish I had gotten variety but did not have time to send back. I have company coming and need the lamp in place now. I would buy another if I could be guaranteed that none of the rocks (maybe 1) was that puke green color.
customer_reviews.author: Annabar

customer_reviews.title: Nice but flawed.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking lamps. Bought a pair to use in our small living room. The first thing that bothered me was how flimsy the actual lamp post is. On both lamps the post was bent. When I bent one into a straight position, it felt as though I could have easily snapped it off had I been less careful. My other complaint is that one lamp is approx 3/4” taller than the other once fully straight. These issues could have been deal breakers but we decided to keep the lamps. Using one in each of our offices instead of in the living room. I’m back on the hunt for black lamps with black shades for that room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love Love these lamps. My husband and I recently re-decorated our bedroom and we did have the floor lamps which were always leaning in one direction or another and never had enough light. I bought two of these to put on the headboard and wow - the light was awesome and better than what we had. They are different than any normal lamp and a conversation piece. My husband loved them so much he had me purchase a third to put on his dresser.
customer_reviews.author: LivinlginWV

customer_reviews.title: almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love the design of this lamp. It fits perfectly on a console table in a dark entryway. The size and shape of the lamp and shade are outstanding. However the "stones" don't look real. The really look like resin. I would have preferred that they look more like stone, the shape is right, but not the finish. Too shiny
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All Lime Green Rocks
customer_reviews.text: Lamp has a great look and touch to a room but 6/8 of the stones were a lime green! Definitely not what was shown in the image on the product page. When the light is turned on at night, some of those lime green stones appear to change color, maybe from the reflection of the 1 red stone on each side.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Smith

customer_reviews.title: It is a great design - I love that it is rectangular so ...
customer_reviews.text: This lamp fits perfectly on my desk. It is a great design - I love that it is rectangular so it sits flush against the wall, not taking up as much space as my previous lamp. The only thing that I am disappointed with is the coloring of the rocks. The photo shoes multi-colored rocks, however the lamp that I received has 6 green rocks and 2 brown. I was anticipating this, though, because a lot of the reviews said the same thing. I took my chances anyway and I love it! I would definitely order it again!
customer_reviews.author: Jenni L.

customer_reviews.title: Stones on lamp don't look real
customer_reviews.text: I rated this low because the image presented doesn't match the reality... that the stones do not look natural at all. The description says it's ceramic but I expected a more realistic stone, not ones that look plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Rubyl969

customer_reviews.title: it looks great because all the light is directed downward and there ...
customer_reviews.text: It is as expected. However, I have it on a low table. Looking down on it when the light is on is blinding because the white insides of the shade are way too bright. I took a sheet of aluminum foil and put it over the top. At night, it looks great because all the light is directed downward and there are no blindingly lit parts... makes a nice accent light.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip H. Darling

customer_reviews.title: Save Yourself the Trouble
customer_reviews.text: Relatively cheap in design. Ridiculous that "rock" groups are identical, splashed with token brown and that aren't even mounted opposingly. Mine arrived with bulb socket broke and cheap styrofoam packing in a million miniscule pieces. Returning, not replacing.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: It's serene.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great lamp, fits perfectly with the decor in our bedroom. Just one problem, apparently the USPS employs dyslexic (not a knock against the folks who are inflicted with this) carriers - it was delivered to an address with all our numbers in it but in the wrong order - this is not the first time. Luckily the person who received it knows us and dropped it off.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Earthy touch with an elegant, upscale feel!
customer_reviews.text: This product was definitely a great purchase. It really brought just enough earth into my room. I am a very specific person and go for specific looks when designing the spaces around me and this was definitely a great purchase. The lamp was a little shorter than I thought, but I expected that it would be shorter because of the description. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who is wanting an earth touch with an elegant feel.
customer_reviews.author: Kollan K.

customer_reviews.title: A true anywhere for everyone lamp.
customer_reviews.text: The picture does this lamp no justice. The lamp, to me, fits any decor. Men and women could find a place for this darling lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Par

customer_reviews.title: really like it.
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that this lamp would not compliment my tribal artifacts and artwork. I am pleasantly surprised! I've had many compliments and I've only had it for a couple weeks.
customer_reviews.author: C. Baker

customer_reviews.title: cute but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: A nice lamp; I agree with other reviewers, it's a little disappointing that the rocks are mostly green (6 green, 2 tan), rather than mult-colored like the picture shows but it still looks nice on the office desk. I might try staining a couple of the rocks... if I'm feeling brave later.
customer_reviews.author: LisaG

customer_reviews.title: These are beautiful. I purchased 3
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful. I purchased 3. Two for my living room and one for my office. I received 2 with the greenish colored rocks and 1 with natural colored. They were sent random. I would have chosen 3 of the natural but I an not unhappy with them. They look great and produce a good amount of light. Usually I only need to use one in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: LEAWE1974

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: Great looing. Use it in my office at work. Nice design, not stogie.
customer_reviews.author: mesimaa

customer_reviews.title: Defective Lamp doesn’t sit upright
customer_reviews.text: The lamp was defective—it doesn’t sit up right. Luckily I was able to hold it upright by placing it between these two walls. I am surprised to have received a product like this from an amazon platform.
customer_reviews.author: DEB

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp, just thought it was bigger I found a spot for it. I just love the design
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable but pleasant to look at.
customer_reviews.text: I like the style of this little lamp, the rocks are green and reddish-brown as some of the other reviews mentioned. My only real complain is that the pole in the center is not very durable. It arrived bent at one of the joints and I had to straighten it. It was very easy to bend and I expect it to bend again if anyone puts even a mild amount of pressure on it.
customer_reviews.author: Internet Dude

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: The colors are not shown the same the rocks are green and ORANGE NOT BROWN so if you dont want that dont buy
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: A rustic modern look
customer_reviews.text: I really love my new bedroom lamp. It is true that the "rocks" look pretty fake because they sort of shine, but I feel it gives it a contemporary look. The feeling I'm trying to create in my bedroom is "rustic modern" and I think this lamp fits. The colors may vary but the rocks on mine are mostly in the green family.
customer_reviews.author: jam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like these lamps very elegant & classy they lit up my living room
customer_reviews.author: Sbanks03

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Awful
customer_reviews.text: Terrible lamp; poorly made. Electrical components fell apart after a few months.
customer_reviews.author: JCalderone

customer_reviews.title: Lamps are beautiful and well made for the cost
customer_reviews.text: I am late posting reviews for the many items I purchased to redecorate my room. I want to say I love these lamps they are beautiful and sturdy and matched my decor perfectly. Package arrived quickly. I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ree

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than it appears in photos, BUT..Perfect in every other way. I ordered two, Very happy with purchase. Perfect packaging. Easy open and assembly
customer_reviews.author: Joann Stark

customer_reviews.title: Short, sleek, pretty
customer_reviews.text: Short, sleek, pretty. The 'rocks' are green as others have indicated, except for the 3rd down reddish one, and the 'rocks' are kind of shiny. Somewhat dim lighting (which I expected).
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rocks are green
customer_reviews.text: Lamp looks great besides the fact that the rocks are ALL light greenish color (see photo)!! In the main photo on Amazon and even on some other reviewers' photos, they at least had the third rock have SOME semblance of brown. I wish mine were more like those.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: True, the rocks do not look natural as I had hoped, but still a very nice light. And, as noted in other reviews, the stones are a dark green... not noticeable in the product photo. Great value for the price. I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme Stoutt

customer_reviews.title: Top pick
customer_reviews.text: Beatiful design! It was the size I wanted perfect light for my living room and gave out more light than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie McLean

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lamp.
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is on the small side .... It's different but beautiful style. Would be great in a office. I returned it because of size to small.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: It's rather small.
customer_reviews.text: I returned the lamp because: A. It was too small for the space it was intended for. B. The stones were two dull colors; not the pretty colors pictured. However, it really is a good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nee  C.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful short lamp, just what I wanted, not so bright, perfect ambiance. Love It!
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN

customer_reviews.title: Returned.
customer_reviews.text: LOL. Tackiest lamp I've ever seen. Looks nothing like the pictures. Arrived broken and bent, so this was an even easier decision to return it.
customer_reviews.author: PenroseTribar

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like the pick
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the pick. Great for a small side table/small space. Was a little worried the ceramic stones would look cheezy but they don't. Shade filters light enough you won't be blinded regardless of the wattage bulb used projecting the light upward and down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made.
customer_reviews.text: I love these small lamps. I have them on top of my small bookcases. Looks perfect there.
customer_reviews.author: stella bravo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: VERY lovely looking lamp. The LIFX Bulb I have in it only adds to its beauty!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: The stone lamp
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected. Bulb holder slightly bent, but easy to realign. Placed in the guest room. Wow really adds a nice touch. Looks elegant. I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S.swaltek

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I expected better. The rocks are a lighter green and they look fake. They look more like earth tones and realistic in the picture. Also, the rocks don't move which I thought they did. I also paid about $50 for it then a few days later, I saw it for $40. I would've paid no more than $30 for this piece if I saw it in person.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they are beautiful and bright
customer_reviews.text: bought these as a present for my mom for her new house in the Dominican Republic. She absoluely adored them. they are beautiful and bright. considering getting a pair for my house as well.
customer_reviews.author: Anna W.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Good choice for a Table Lamp. Very Good, individual and Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen B.

customer_reviews.title: Good little lamp that could
customer_reviews.text: Great little side lamp. Contemporary and stylish. I have had it for 2 months. No problem. Shipped well. Gives enough light to use in the morning when I'm getting ready.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This lamp gives the perfect touch to my very bohemian, zen living room.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Looks pretty much just as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty much just as pictured, however the bottom stones in this pic look blue but our lamp actually bottom stones are green like the top. I think it would have looked better with blue...but that is just my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you like waterfalls you'll love this lamp
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lamp adds a sense of peace to your room.. Good for tabletops, dressers nightstands (short) rocks are glossy base is heavy.. Few chipped rocks
customer_reviews.author: Dj

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful accent lamp
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this lamp it did look a little Greener, the stones I mean but the lamp is beautiful the base is beautiful it's sturdy and it really is a very elegant, modern accent piece.
customer_reviews.author: Damon Washington

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and the black lampshade diffuses light exactly as I was hoping it would.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for. Read the reviews so we weren't surprised that 6 of 8 rocks are greenish. That is actually what sold us. Great bang for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My living room looks so good with this table lamp. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Majida Shariff

customer_reviews.title: WILMA!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Yabba Dabba Doo! It's like a lamp from the Flintstones. Stone-age chic. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: The rocks are nice two-tone polished & great for a space where you ...
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a small lamp that brought a bit of nature to its look. The rocks are nice two-tone polished & great for a space where you don't want a lamp to take up the majority of a foyer table. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine M

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love this as an accent light on my end table in the living room!
customer_reviews.author: jodie hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Rocks not colored as pictured, mostly green except 2 reddish ones :/ but overall worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Marc A. Spence

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp, looks high quality. Agree with other commenters that there should be more variety in the stone colors.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: NICE LAMP; CHARMING AND JUST THE RIGHT SIZE FOR A SMALL END TABLE.
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp. Other reviews commented that some of the "rocks" are too green, but their color is quite subtle.
customer_reviews.author: bonnie brooklyn girl

customer_reviews.title: Nice tv light!
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like the picture! Throws a lot of light! Perfect for on top of my tv! Shade is grey when the light is on! Stones are pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Purkey

customer_reviews.title: This was a surprisingly beautiful purchase. It's so unique and well made
customer_reviews.text: This was a surprisingly beautiful purchase. It's so unique and well made. It takes up to 60 watts, so it gives off soft lighting. I love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia H.

customer_reviews.title: Ugly rocks, great looking lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great overall, but the stacked rocks look extra manufactured. Really helps tie the room together otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The shade came over the rocks so the rocks was not displayed
customer_reviews.author: Blacklove

customer_reviews.title: Small lamp, big in design.  Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is so pretty and unique with the stones. The shade matches my dining room overhead light and they compliment one another.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Reader

customer_reviews.title: Not like photo.
customer_reviews.text: May have to return. The glass stones are green and orange. I was expecting black. Perhaps you need better photos.
customer_reviews.author: May St George

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Designs Lamp
customer_reviews.text: It's cute, but kind of cheesy. Still, I like it, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice lamp - the rocks are quite green and look ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice lamp - the rocks are quite green and look a little too shiny but very nice.

customer_reviews.title: Love this lamp!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome lamp! I have received so many compliments about it. I absolutely love it and it fits into my house perfectly!

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very very small not as wide as it appears to be and one came broke at the part where u put the bulb.

customer_reviews.title: The quality is perfect. however my only concern is about the colors ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality is perfect.however my only concern is about the colors in the picture, its not really clear as in the picture the shade of the light is reflected to the stones and the color is not clear.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I came in broken and I was shocks at the low quality for the price.

customer_reviews.text: This is a cool lamp, but the picture is deceiving. The stones are lime green.

customer_reviews.text: When I received it the top was bent.. beautiful lamp if it's not bent
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: I just think it was so unique and for a small lamp the light it provides is good.
customer_reviews.text: It is so different from the traditional lamp. I just think it was so unique and for a small lamp the light it provides is good.

customer_reviews.title: Brokenhearted.
customer_reviews.text: Broken on arrival. But still nice lamps. Thank goodness I live and die by super glue.

customer_reviews.title: They look great. Only thing is I wish the on/off switch ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for my nighstands. They look great. Only thing is I wish the on/off switch was on the lamp base and not the cord.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great !
customer_reviews.text: Just as shown in the picture. I bought two of them for our bedroom. Very contemporary look. We are receiving compliments for the choice made !

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Little smaller than they look but I still like them!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: OMG this is the best and perfect for what I wanted.

customer_reviews.title: Overall pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking lamp... rocks are definitely green and shiny, but still nice. Had to put a pretty low wattage bulb in as it will blind you if you look at it from above.

customer_reviews.title: Elegant-looking lamp for bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Looks quite elegant, and decent for the price. It is actually quite heavy and stable on the surface. Packaging was also great.

customer_reviews.title: Sweet little lamp.
customer_reviews.text: Sweet LITTLE lamp, black shade shows the cat hair but not a bid deal. Really nice, unique look.

customer_reviews.text: Such a cute lamp. Clearly not high-end but a good buy for the money.

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp! It is a perfect fit for my living room.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lamp. I so love it
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Lamp. I so love it. The only one thing negative I'll say about it is, the stones are colored. I thought the coloring would be more stone like, however it is still a beautiful lamp. Very happy.:-)

customer_reviews.title: Good Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like the picture. Did not disappoint. The light is not dark it's quite bright too. Good piece. The stones are not real.

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful

customer_reviews.title: It's a LIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: on/off switch in the line cord sucks! Put a switch on the base of the lamp so I don't have to look for it every time I want light.....

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this lamp!!! Looks way better than the picture😍

customer_reviews.text: Nice night stand lamp, compact and looks contemporary with a hint of rustic.

customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite small lamps. I love it. I wish the manufacturer had a larger version of it!

customer_reviews.text: Really liked it but wish it would of been taller

product_meta.title: Elegant Designs LT1036-BLK Rectangular Dual Stacked Stone Ceramic Table Lamp, 14.5" x 12" x 6.3", Black
product_meta.description: Elegant Designs LT1036-BLK Rectangular Dual Stacked Stone Ceramic Table Lamp, Black
feature_bullets: Add a contemporary flair to any room with this lovely stacked stone table lamp. Dual stacked ceramic stones sit atop a rectangular base to create this extremely modern lamp. The black fabric shade and Earth tones complete the look. Perfect lamp for a bedroom, living area, or professional office. We believe that lighting is like jewelry for your home. Our products will help to enhance your room with chic sophistication.
Black rectangular fabric shade and base
Uses 1 x 60W Type A Medium Base Bulb (not included)
Dual stacked ceramic stones, note that there may be color variations of stones due to dying process
Height: 14.5" Shade opening: L: 12" x W: 6.3"

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars255 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
